creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: rectangular blue fabric with white vines and alternating lines of red and brown dots; fragment sewn on one side, folded on other; open top and bottom, hemmed edge along bottom
markings: interior LL, Thomas Murray Collection label (upside down): OKI 6059 | interior LL, Jack Lenor Larsen label (upside down): 890 29B
medium: Cloth: Japanese fiber banana (bashō); bingata (stencil resist with applied pigments)
title: Blue-ground fragment decorated with dots and vines
